name: Alberich's Pointed Hat
How to Acquire:
The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Albinauric Mask
Special Effect:
+4 Arcane,
reduces the HP recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears
How to Acquire:
Found in Volcano Manor near the Guest Hall grace. Ascend the stairs to the top floor of the building. Head outside and take the ladder to your left onto the roof. Go to the back of the roof and jump off the right side to a balcony, then enter a room with an Omenkiller, the Albinauric Staff, and the Albinauric Mask.
Elden Ring Map here

name: All-Knowing Helm
How to Acquire:
The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. He is fought in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Aristocrat Hat
How to Acquire: Drops from Soldier Aristocrats that can be found wandering the roads of most areas.

name: Aristocrat Headband
How to Acquire: Rare chance to drop from Aristocrat Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Aristocrat enemies that wander the roads of most areas.        Easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins, south of the Road to the Manor site of grace.

name: Astrologer Hood
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for  1,000 Runes. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Ash-of-War Scarab
Special Effect: Slightly reduces the FP cost of skills, Increases damage taken
How to Acquire:
Behind the waygate on the Limgrave Tower Bridge that takes you to the Divine Tower of Limgrave on a broken section of the bridge.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Azur's Glintstone Crown
Special Effect: Raises the potency of Azur's primeval current sorceries at the cost of additional FP consumption.
How to Acquire:
The complete Azur's Glintstone Set is found at Azur's location after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline where you side with her.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Bandit Mask
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in North Limgrave for  1500 Runes. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Banished Knight Helm
How to Acquire: Dropped by Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.

name: Beast Champion Helm
How to Acquire: The entire Beast Champion Set drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. Either defeat him at Warmaster's Shack or defeat the Recusant Bernahl invasion in Crumbling Farum Azula. Location in Elden Ring Map here.

name: Black Knife Hood
How to Acquire: The entire Black Knife Set is found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds. Map Link.

name: Blackflame Monk Hood
How to Acquire: Drops from Blackflame Monks

name: Bloodhound Knight Helm
How to Acquire: The entire Bloodhound Knight Set is dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup in the Gelmir Hero's Grave. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Bloodsoaked Mask
How to Acquire:
Looted from a corpse in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds near the Underground Roadside site of grace.
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Blue Cloth Cowl
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.        Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria)
Elden Ring Map here

name: Briar Helm
Special Effect: Deals damage when rolling into targets. Damage increases exponentially with more briar pieces.
How to Acquire: Purchased from the Enia in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle

name: Bull-Goat Helm
How to Acquire:
Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Carian Knight Helm
How to Acquire: From the Church of the Cuckoo site of grace, travel to the rotating lift section. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue. The entire Carian Knight Set is found at the foot of that statue..

name: Chain Coif
How to Acquire:
Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kal√©. It costs 1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Cleanrot Helm
How to Acquire: Dropped by Cleanrot Knights in the Swamp of Aeonia, The Shaded Castle, or Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Champion Headband
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for  1,000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Commoner's Headband
How to Acquire:
The Commoner's Headband is found on a corpse in Mt. Gelmir. After the Temple of Eiglay site of grace, take the elevator up and jump off the outside balcony into the area below. Follow the path past the Abductor Virgin into the window of the manor. Continue until you are on a walkway overlooking the lake the lava lake with Serpent statues on the right side. The Commoner's Headpiece is on a corpse on the head of the second statue.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Confessor Hood
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Crimson Hood
How to Acquire:
Stormveil Castle: It is found where the Chrysalids' Memento was initially found after unlocking Spirit Tuning.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Crucible Axe Helm
Special Effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
How to Acquire: The whole Crucible Axe Set is dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis Boss. Elden Ring Map Link.

name: Crucible Tree Helm
Special Effect: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
How to Acquire:
The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Eccentric's Hood
How to Acquire:
The entire Eccentric Set is obtained from choosing to kill Witch-Hunter Jerren at the end of Sorceress Sellen's questline.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Elden Lord Crown
How to Acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

name: Exile Hood
How to Acquire: Drop from Castle Guard.

name: Fia's Hood
How to Acquire: Found on Fia after progressing her questline and defeating Lichdragon Fortissax.

name: Fingerprint Helm
How to Acquire:
Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon defeat.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Finger Maiden Fillet
How to Acquire:
Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run past NPC invader to touch Grace first.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Fire Monk Hood
How to Acquire: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintop of the Giants.

name: Foot Soldier Cap
How to Acquire: Dropped by enemy Foot Soldiers across the game.

name: Foot Soldier Helmet
How to Acquire: Dropped by Foot Soldiers in Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Gelmir Knight Helm
How to Acquire: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Godrick Knight Helm
How to Acquire: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knights scattered across Limgrave.

name: Godrick Soldier Helm
How to Acquire: Gatefront Ruins: Dropped by the Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost

name: Godskin Apostle Hood
How to Acquire:
Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Greathelm
How to Acquire:
Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for  1,800 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Great Horned Headband
How to Acquire: Drops from Ancestral Follower in Siofra River

name: Guilty Hood
How to Acquire:
Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  500 Runes. 
Elden Ring Map here        Can be found on a corpse in the sewers north of Avenue Balcony site in Leyndell Royal Capital. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Haligtree Helm
How to Acquire: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
How to Acquire:
Hermit Village in Mt. Gelmir: Found on a corpse behind a house on the south side of the village.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Highwayman Hood
How to Acquire: Dropped by a Bandit at Murkwater Cave

name: Hoslow's Helm
How to Acquire:
All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Imp Head (Cat)
How to Acquire:
Found on a corpse inside the Impaler's Catacombs.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Imp Head (Corpse)
How to Acquire:
Looted from a corpse in an alley off the avenue in Leyndell, Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Imp Head (Elder)
How to Acquire: Can be found as a treasure inside Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs, in a room in the second floor, guarded by a Burial Tree Watchdog. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Imp Head (Fanged)
How to Acquire: Rare drop from Imps

name: Imp Head (Long-Tongued)
How to Acquire: Can be looted off of Imps in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds

name: Imp Head (Wolf)
How to Acquire:
Can be found in the Minor Erdtree Catacombs within Caelid on a body laying over a sarcophagus.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Iron Helmet
How to Acquire:
Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1500 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Incantation Scarab
Special Effect: Slightly reduces the FP cost of incantations, Increases damage taken
How to Acquire:
Need to examine the Homing Instinct Painting at Artist's Shack first. The Incantation Scarab can be found Southwest of the Dragon-Burnt Ruins, there will be a gravestone with a ghost sitting in front of it. Interact with the ghost, and it will drop the Incantation Scarab.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Juvenile Scholar Cap
How to Acquire:
The entire Juvenile Scholar Set and a Larval Tear is obtained by completing the Resurrection Painting puzzle.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Kaiden Helm
How to Acquire: Drops from Kaiden Sellsword enemies. They can be found east of Limgrave's lake.

name: Karolos Glintstone Crown
How to Acquire:
From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria Academy, head out the door and hug the western wall, ignoring the broken staircase or any open doorways. A crystal crab is hiding in the corner near the cliff edge.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Knight Helm
How to Acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for  3,000 Runes.

name: Land of Reeds Helm
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.        Sold by Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow for 1,000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Leyndell Knight Helm
How to Acquire: Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Lionel's Helm
How to Acquire: Lionel's Armor Set is found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Malformed Dragon Helm
How to Acquire:
Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Maliketh's Helm
How to Acquire: Bought from the Enia in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

name: Marais Mask
How to Acquire:
Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan, a hostile NPC found in the fields west of The Shaded Castle.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Marionette Soldier Helm
How to Acquire: Drops from Marionette Soldiers often found at Liurnia of the Lakes or Mt. Gelmir.

name: Marionette Soldier Birdhelm
How to Acquire: Dropped from winged Marionette Soldiers.

name: Mask of Confidence
How to Acquire:
Found on a corpse laying on the walls of the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Mushroom Crown
Special Effect: Raises attack power when something nearby suffers from poison or rot
How to Acquire:
Found on a corpse hanging off of a pillar ruin in the south-eastern corner of Lake of Rot. Climb around the outside of the ruin to reach it.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Mushroom Head
How to Acquire:
Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Navy Hood
How to Acquire:
The Navy Hood along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Night Maiden Twin Crown
How to Acquire: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.        Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Silver Tear Ball. Once this building's shortcut is opened these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

name: Nox Mirrorhelm
How to Acquire: Cliffbottom Catacombs: In the sealed room, accessible by using a Stonesword Key at the Imp Statue. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Octopus Head
How to Acquire: Found by killing Land Octopus or Giant Land Octopus        There are dozens of them south-west of Temple Quarter site of grace

name: Olivinus Glintstone Crown
How to Acquire:
From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace, turn left and head to the room at the end of the corridor. Attack the empty bookshelf to reveal a hidden passage. Head out, turn left, and then jump up the rocks to find this item on a corpse.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Omensmirk Mask
How to Acquire:
Dropped by Omensmirk and wearing mask outside of Lower Capital Church Site of Grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Page Hood
How to Acquire: Drops from Page enemies.

name: Perfumer Hood
How to Acquire: Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Preceptor's Big Hat
How to Acquire:
Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Prisoner Iron Mask
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for  1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Prophet Blindfold
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.        Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  1,000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Pumpkin Helm
Special Effect: Reduces damage from headshots and impacts.
How to Acquire:
Dropped by Pumpkin Head. Can be found in Castle Morne's courtyard, [Elden Ring Map here] or at Waypoint Ruins.
[Elden Ring Map here]

name: Radahn's Redmane Helm
How to Acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

name: Raging Wolf Helm
How to Acquire: Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Queen's Crescent Crown
How to Acquire:
The Queen's Crescent Crown Helm can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 7,000 
Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

name: Radiant Gold Mask
How to Acquire:
Found on collapsed bridge NW of Writheblood Ruins. Drop down two times heading south and it is on a body.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Rotten Duelist Helm
Special Effect: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes
How to Acquire:
Dropped by a Rotten Duelist in the Consecrated Snowfield.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Ruler's Mask
How to Acquire:
The Ruler's Mask Helm can be found on a corpse laying face-down on a carriage northeast of the Abandoned Coffin site of grace in west Altus Plateau, alongside the Ruler's Robe.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Sage Hood
How to Acquire:
Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the end, guarded by Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Silver Tear Mask
How to Acquire:
Dropped by the Mimic Tear boss in Nokron, Eternal City.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Scaled Helm
How to Acquire:
Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Shining Horned Headband
How to Acquire: Chance to drop from Ancestral Follower Shaman, which can be found singing in the Ancestral Woods in Siofra River.        The Ancestral Woods area is only available after gaining access to Nokron, Eternal City.

name: Snow Witch Hat
How to Acquire:
Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise during the progression of Ranni's questline.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Traveler's Hat
How to Acquire:
Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's Set.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Traveling Maiden Hood
How to Acquire:
On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Twinned Helm
How to Acquire:
Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter.
Elden Ring Map here        Obtained at end of D Hunter's questline.

name: Twinsage Glintstone Crown
How to Acquire:
Dropped by a crab in Raya Lucaria Academy. Very close to Azur's Glintstone Staff.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Vagabond Knight Helm
How to Acquire:
A Starting Equipment Piece for the Vagabond Class.        Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000  Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Veteran's Helm
How to Acquire: Can be bought from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Niall

name: Vulgar Militia Helm
How to Acquire: Can be found by killing Vulgar Militiamen enemies.

name: Zamor Mask
How to Acquire:
Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Glintstone Scarab
Special Effect: Slightly reduces the FP cost of Sorceries, Increases damage taken
How to Acquire:
Found inside a chest in Raya Lucaria Academy, past the Iron Ball Trap.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Cerulean Tear Scarab
Special Effect: Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Cerulean Tears, but increases damage taken.
How to Acquire:
Sellia, Town of Sorcery in Caelid. Found on a corpse on top of a roof in the northeast section of town. Requires platforming across the rooftops.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Okina Mask
How to Acquire:
Dropped by Bloody Finger Okina at Mountaintops of the Giants.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Witch's Glintstone Crown
How to Acquire:
Obtained by progressing in Sorceress Sellen's Questline.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Alberich's Pointed Hat (Altered)
How to Acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Alberich's Pointed Hat if you have it in your possession.

name: Banished Knight Helm (Altered)
How to Acquire: Stormveil Castle. Looted from the Banished Knight located next to the Chapel in the northwest section, where Sorcerer Rogier is located.        Boc the Seamster can alter the original Banished Knight Helm, if you have it in your possession.

name: Black Dumpling
Special Effect: Raises attack when the wearer suffers from madness
How to Acquire: Dropped by the enemies found at Volcano Manor who wear it.

name: Black Hood
How to Acquire: In the Sage's Cave, in a treasure chest behind an illusory wall. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Black Wolf Mask
How to Acquire:
Found behind Seluvis's Rise, reached by running and jumping up the crumbling part of the wall near the entrance to the tower.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Blackguard's Iron Mask
How to Acquire:
Dropped by the merchant Blackguard Big Boggart upon defeat. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Blue Festive Hood
How to Acquire: Dropped by the blue clothed dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village.

name: Blue Silver Mail Hood
How to Acquire: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.        One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

name: Cleanrot Helm (Altered)
How to Acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Cleanrot Helm into Cleanrot Helm (Altered).

name: Commoner's Headband (Altered)
How to Acquire: Dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.        The non-altered Commoner's Headband is looted from a specific corpse and neither piece can be altered by the player.

name: Confessor Hood (Altered)
How to Acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Confessor Hood into Confessor Hood (Altered).

name: Consort's Mask
How to Acquire: Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy site of grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Crimson Tear Scarab
Special Effect: Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears, but increases damage taken.
How to Acquire:
On a rooftop at Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Cuckoo Knight Helm
How to Acquire: Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo Knights. There are three near the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

name: Depraved Perfumer Headscarf
How to Acquire: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.

name: Diallos's Mask
How to Acquire:
Found upon completion of Diallos's questline.        Can also be gained by killing Diallos in North Liurnia of the Lakes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Drake Knight Helm
How to Acquire: The entire Drake Knight Set is found in Crumbling Farum Azula. From the Dragon Temple Roof site of Grace, kill both Stormhawks you see first, then descend the ladder. Look left from the bottom of the ladder and drop down onto a balcony. Follow the path and circle around the tower to find the set in a chest. [Elden Ring Map here]

name: Drake Knight Helm (Altered)
How to Acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Drake Knight Helm if you have it in your possession.

name: Duelist Helm
Special Effect: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes
How to Acquire: The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Eccentric's Hood (Altered)
How to Acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Eccentric's Hood into Eccentric's Hood (Altered).

name: Envoy Crown
How to Acquire:
Miquella's Haligtree. Southeast of the Haligtree Canopy site of grace, on a corpse at the southern tip of the thicker right branch.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Festive Hood
How to Acquire: Dropped from the yellow clothed dancers in Dominula, Windmill Village

name: Festive Hood (Altered)
How to Acquire: Obtained by altering Festive Hood at a site of grace or via Boc the Seamster.

name: Fire Prelate Helm
How to Acquire: Dropped by Fire Prelates, found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir or in the Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

name: Foot Soldier Helm
How to Acquire: It can be farmed at Caelid. Starting from the grace Chamber Outside the Plaza in Redmane Castle, go south and there will be four foot soldiers wearing the helm.

name: Gilded Foot Soldier Cap
How to Acquire: Chance to drop from Soldier enemies found in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Godskin Noble Hood
How to Acquire: Defeat the Godskin Noble found on the bridge that connects the study hall to the Divine Tower of Liurnia. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Greathood
How to Acquire:
Given as a reward for solving the puzzle of the Sorcerer Painting. Travel slightly south of Castle Sol to the Snow Valley Ruins Overlook. From there, head for the nearby bridge, where a ghost of a painter can be found. Speak to the painter to receive the Greathood.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Guardian Mask
How to Acquire: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.

name: Haima Glintstone Crown
How to Acquire: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.        The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge. Elden Ring Map Link

name: Haligtree Knight Helm
How to Acquire:
Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Looted from a corpse located near the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace. It is in the room at the top of the ladder directly adjacent to the grace site. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: High Page Hood
How to Acquire: The High Page Hood and High Page Clothes can be farmed from High Pages.        The earliest one that can be found is in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site, enter the church and take the shortcut ladder up. On the other side of the room is a long hallway with a High Page at the end.        They can also be found in Leyndell, Royal Capital in various buildings.

name: Iji's Mirrorhelm
How to Acquire: After the player confronts Blaidd during Ranni's questline, War Counselor Iji will have new dialogue available. Upon exhausting that and returning to the area again, his corpse can be found near his usual spot at the Road to the Manor grace site. Upon his anvil the player will find Iji's Mirrorhelm as well as Iji's Bell Bearing. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Iron Kasa
How to Acquire:
Acquired by following Yura's questline.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Jar
Special Effect: Boosts the power of throwing pot items
How to Acquire:
Given to the player by Iron Fist Alexander. Follow his questline until you find him in Mt. Gelmir near Seethewater Terminus. Completing his dialogue here will award the player with the Jar.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Lazuli Glintstone Crown
How to Acquire: See the location on the Elden Ring Map here.        Found at Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Leyndell Soldier Helm
How to Acquire: This helm and other pieces of the Leyndell Soldier Set can be looted as drops from the foot soldiers scattered around Altus Plateau, and Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Lusat's Glintstone Crown
Special Effect: Increases the power of Stars of Ruin, Increases all FP consumption
How to Acquire:
Lusat's Glintstone Crown can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The legwraps will be there, along with the rest of his set for the taking.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Malenia's Winged Helm
How to Acquire: Purchased from Enia for 12,000 runes after defeating Malenia Blade of Miquella

name: Night's Cavalry Helm
How to Acquire: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map

name: Night's Cavalry Helm (Altered)
How to Acquire: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Night's Cavalry Helm, if you have it in your possession.

name: Nomadic Merchant's Chapeau
How to Acquire:
After defeating Mohg, the Omen, open the secret passage behind the altar and journey into the mass grave. The full Nomadic Merchant's Set is found behind the first breakable tent you can see. Break the tent by baiting out a Frenzy attack from the Nomad there.
[Elden Ring Map here]

name: Nox Monk Hood
How to Acquire: Can be looted from the Nox Priest common enemies in Nokstella, Eternal City.

name: Nox Monk Hood (Altered)
How to Acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Monk Hood into Nox Monk Hood (Altered).

name: Nox Swordstress Crown
How to Acquire: Pieces of the Nox Swordstress Set are dropped by Nox Swordstress enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.        Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding giant ants.

name: Nox Swordstress Crown (Altered)
How to Acquire: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Swordstress Crown into Nox Swordstress Crown (Altered).

name: Old Aristocrat Cowl
How to Acquire: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from other Aristocrats.        There are a number of Old Aristocrats within the caravan of enemies north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.        Altus Plateau- There are Old Aristocrats to the left of Gold Mask's Bridge.

name: Omen Helm
Special Effect: Increases damage of Omen Bairn and Regal Omen Bairn
How to Acquire:
The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Radahn Soldier Helm
How to Acquire:
Easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael.
Elden Ring Map Here

name: Ragged Hat
How to Acquire: Not currently obtainable.

name: Ragged Hat (Altered)
How to Acquire: Not currently obtainable.

name: Raya Lucarian Helm
How to Acquire: The Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor drop all pieces of the Raya Lucarian Soldier Set. They are easily farmed on the ramparts after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

name: Redmane Knight Helm
How to Acquire:
Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Royal Knight Helm
How to Acquire: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Royal Knight Loretta for  4000.

name: Royal Remains Helm
Special Effect: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced
How to Acquire: Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after beating him.

name: Sacred Crown Helm
How to Acquire:
Drops from the ballista soldiers just outside of the Elpheal Inner Wall site of Grace.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Sanguine Noble Hood
How to Acquire:
The entire Sanguine Noble Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in west Mountaintops of The Giants. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Skeletal Mask
How to Acquire:
he Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Spellblade's Pointed Hat
Special Effect: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%
How to Acquire: Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

name: Tree Sentinel Helm
How to Acquire:
The entire Tree Sentinel Set is obtained by destroying all three chariots in the Auriza Hero's Grave.
Elden Ring Map here

name: White Mask
Special Effect: Slightly raises attack power (10% for 20s) when there is blood loss nearby
How to Acquire: The entire War Surgeon Set is obtained after defeating all three nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the blood swamp near the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum.
